website_summaries.verdict: One of the most reliable bottle openers on the market today.
pros: Constructed from eco-friendly and recyclable materials
Coated handle enables you to grip the bottle opener comfortably
cons: May be too large to carry around

customer_reviews.title: Great simple opener.
customer_reviews.text: Does exactly what I wanted in the style I wanted. For home use this will last forever. Bought the three pack and in short order friends saw and loved them so I gave away two and bought another set. Love the coating on the handle rather than just paint or coloring of some sort. Heavy duty enough you know you bought a tool and not a toy
customer_reviews.author: bugeater

customer_reviews.title: The Best to Use
customer_reviews.text: I have bartended in high volume locations for over 3 decades. I used this type of bottle opener for a long time, but lost the ones that I had. This type of opener is the best to use. It fits easily in any pocket and it's easy to grab and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Not comfortable but work well
customer_reviews.text: These are built well and work well. The rubber material doesn’t slip in your hand and the steel doesn’t flex or seem soft. The design opens bottles very well. They however really aren’t comfortable to use. The price isn’t bad and they work as advertised, so I’ll only take off 1 ⋆ for the lack of comfort. If I had to use these all day it could become an issue with the poor handle shape.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Have had others like this, but they some how get 'lost' when ...
customer_reviews.text: So far, these openers do what I bought them for - opening beer and soda pop bottles. They are heavy duty (not heavy) and appear to be well made. It's been too soon to determine how they will hold up or if they will rust until use at the lake and beach, and on the patio. I've put on in the kitchen, one on the patio and one in the truck. I'll probably get another one for the boat when I start using it again. Have had others like this, but they some how get 'lost' when I take them to BBQs, or tail gate parties, or at someone's house.
customer_reviews.author: Steven H

customer_reviews.title: A good opener to improve on!
customer_reviews.text: I like they were a good size to hold on to when using and they were made out of stainless steel! I disliked the stamped edges were ruff and had a pretty square edge! I rounded the edges and the ruff sides as well as the edges around the opener end and the circle on the other end. Made for a smoother feel and a more finished look. Then i wrapped them in paracord so they can be placed on the bar without clanking and are raised off the surface so they are much easier to pick up!
customer_reviews.author: mkd

customer_reviews.title: Functional bargain
customer_reviews.text: I like that you get multiple of the same items for a good deal. They work great and I have them at our bar area, kitchen, and office. It brings cohesiveness through the house for a simple item we use daily in multiple places.
customer_reviews.author: Coldoff

customer_reviews.title: works great, but large!
customer_reviews.text: they look good, but these things are quite large! they work beautifully from either side. the lip is wide enough that's it sketches bottle caps first time everytime wish i didn't have to order a 3-pack, so i ended giving a couple to friends who also like how they work.
customer_reviews.author: cincyreds

customer_reviews.title: Works well and good price
customer_reviews.text: Works really well, I like the big hole on the opposite end of opener, so it can be tied to a cooler. But such a good price you can give them away or put one in every drawer ;-). Just got it so I can’t speak to longevity, but it feels sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Efromthebronx

customer_reviews.title: Handy set of bottle openers
customer_reviews.text: This product arrived as expected and is an excellent value for the price. The openers are easy to use and durable. They arrived in a timely manner.
customer_reviews.author: Troylene

customer_reviews.title: Extremely durable opener
customer_reviews.text: I love the thickness, the weight, and the sturdiness of this product. I imagine it will last for decades. It is a full seven inches and easy to handle.
customer_reviews.author: Eli K.

customer_reviews.title: Breaks glass bottles
customer_reviews.text: This opener is poorly designed. The metal part that catches underneath the bottle cap is not shaped right. It will catch under the glass bottle lip as well, and shatter the glass as you pry the bottle cap off. There will be glass fragments in your drink.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Mihal

customer_reviews.title: Solid Product, quick 1 day delivery!
customer_reviews.text: I needed a new (more presentable) speed opener for side-jobs catering. I also gave one to 2 friends who I work with. We all like them!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Clumsy to use.
customer_reviews.text: I bought them to open mason jars. They didn’t work at all. Sent them back. They are very big too.
customer_reviews.author: Ginnymae

customer_reviews.title: Quick shipment, received them in 3 days.
customer_reviews.text: The bottle openers were exactly what I wanted. Rubber coated for easy use, easy on the hand grip. I bought them for my daughter who is a bartender in a college town. She likes the flatness so she can carry it in her back pocket and grab and pull it from her jeans.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel E.

customer_reviews.title: Attractive and practical
customer_reviews.text: Easy to get a secure grip with lots of leverage. Well designed and attractive. Large, but easy to place into and withdraw from kitchen drawer. I don't think we'll ever lose it, but just, in case, it comes with two more openers, waiting their turn.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Large size. Well made. Material sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: I received the item today. It is pretty large (7 inches long) to carry around. I think it is good for household use and store use. The item is well made, and the material is sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer In Los Angeles

customer_reviews.title: A basic, solid, well made bottle opener, ...
customer_reviews.text: A basic, solid, well made bottle opener, It’ll last a lifetime. I was surprised at how long it is, star deduct for that. Otherwise, can’t go wrong.
customer_reviews.author: fjd

customer_reviews.title: Good leverage, stiff
customer_reviews.text: A little bigger than I expected although I realized the dimensions, but these are pro bar quality. Good leverage, stiff, no flex. Really like them
customer_reviews.author: QWP

customer_reviews.title: perfection
customer_reviews.text: wish they were magnetic .....strong, sturdy, makes opening beer bottles a breeze.......
customer_reviews.author: R. Braun

customer_reviews.title: Great product, great price, fast service
customer_reviews.text: I had my old opener for at least a decade and left it behind on a vacation. I was really excited to find these. It's the same quality product I used to have at a great price. The opener was delivered quickly and I'm very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: A. Berry

customer_reviews.title: Handy, sturdy, easy to clean.
customer_reviews.text: I use these daily and they're always ready to go. Since I got three I'll be able to gift one or two to some friends. They're a flash to wash and takes up practically no space in my drawer.
customer_reviews.author: Kristopher Wood

customer_reviews.title: Great opener
customer_reviews.text: These are nice solid bottle openers. I bought a few at the grocery store and these are better than what I found in the store.
customer_reviews.author: Keith

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy little bottle openers...
customer_reviews.text: I needed a few bottle openers for the lake house (to make sure we always had one handy... these are great bottle openers.. very sturdy.. I'm a little concerned how the plastic coating will hold up if they get left out on the deck very often, but so far, so good.
customer_reviews.author: B. Turney

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and simple and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This bottle opener should last a lifetime. It is so easy to use and so sturdy there is no need for another type of bottle opener.
customer_reviews.author: James Lutfy

customer_reviews.title: Good value and works great.
customer_reviews.text: Always looking for a bottle opener was making me crazy. This three pack solved my problem. Well made and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Gibson

customer_reviews.title: Well made!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for sturdy bottle openers at an affordable price and I found them. I really like them. I will give one to my friend who lives in Mexico and works as bartender at parties. He will love it because it is very sturdy and it will last many many parties!😀
customer_reviews.author: maria rosario garcia

customer_reviews.title: Work great and are great quality!
customer_reviews.text: These work great and are great quality!! They are rather large but i have bigger hands so they fit fine.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Large size and easy to grip. Seems like a quality product that will last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: TJC

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I like the grips on these. Easy to open and they’re similar to the ones they use in bars.
customer_reviews.author: plaztkman

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and heavy like I was expecting. Works great.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: The Bottle Opener Re-Invented Tastefully.
customer_reviews.text: A strong, durable, high quality "Tool". Is flat and takes up very little space. Great leverage for removing bottle tops. Comfortable, no scratch handle. Cool modern, retro look. A hole for hanging (if needed).
customer_reviews.author: Todd Erickson

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy and just a good standard bar key. I use every shift as a bartender
customer_reviews.author: kellie

customer_reviews.title: Extremely easy to use! Will last forever!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely the best bottle openers you could ever have, the 3 pack is great but 1 will last a lifetime! Opens bottles easier than any other opener I’ve used.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: very nice I really like the rubber coated handle
customer_reviews.text: very nice I really like the rubber coated handle, after long hours of using it my hands are not raw like using just flat metal openers. I would recomend these to anyone who opens bottles for a living !
customer_reviews.author: curtis keith

customer_reviews.title: sturdy and larger than expected but good
customer_reviews.text: sturdy and larger than expected but good! About the size of my hand and I have average size hands for a woman.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: A Quality product! Love the vinyl coating on the handle! Works great!
customer_reviews.author: GEORGE A

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very good bottle openers . Large and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: RONNIE BRADLEY

customer_reviews.title: Love these bottle openers
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these bottle openers. I love the size and weight of them and also love that they are magnetic. It is such a great deal -- getting 3 of them for a very reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Ray Stone

customer_reviews.title: Shipping took way to long
customer_reviews.text: Product is good, I'm just giving it 2 stars for the prolong shipping. Said 1 week, but it took 2 weeks. The tracking said it was in my city for 1 week. So yeah!
customer_reviews.author: Bryant

customer_reviews.title: Perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect. Or near. Would be cool if it was magnetic but it works very well.
customer_reviews.author: Anna M. Campbell

customer_reviews.title: but very nice.
customer_reviews.text: These are very large, heavy duty too, but very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Danny Angotti

customer_reviews.title: They work!
customer_reviews.text: Nice design, look good and work well. 3 pac is a great idea- one in the camper, one in the truck and one for home use.
customer_reviews.author: jay shaver

customer_reviews.title: Great bottle opener!
customer_reviews.text: These bottle openers are perfect. They give you the leverage needed to easily get the cap off in one try.
customer_reviews.author: Rich Kellogg

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to find, easy open, very sturdy! Great purchase, thanks!
customer_reviews.author: David W McClung

customer_reviews.title: Hefty
customer_reviews.text: Nice big heavy gauge bottle opener with soft touch rubber coating handle. Nice!
customer_reviews.author: seoulman

customer_reviews.title: Bartenders best friend
customer_reviews.text: I’m a bartender and these are the best bottle openers I’ve found!! The other bartenders I work with love them as well!
customer_reviews.author: Maggie Mub

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I needed these for a gig I had coming up, and they arrived one day earlier than expected and they worked great!
customer_reviews.author: Damien Horrocks

customer_reviews.title: seems like it will last for a long time
customer_reviews.text: Very well made,a true pleasure to use,seems like it will last for a long time.The coating over the opener is a very nice enhancement.
customer_reviews.author: bruno von forstmeyer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit!
customer_reviews.text: We bought these for our restaurant and our staff was very happy with them!
customer_reviews.author: Randi Henderson

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Bottle openers
customer_reviews.text: Great purchase--exactly what I wanted for our home bar. I kept one in the kitchen as well.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Fesenmyer

customer_reviews.title: Good solid product
customer_reviews.text: Simple design but works exceptionally. A solid product for a great price!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Vendor
customer_reviews.text: Good openers. Easy to use and sturdy. Would def buy again!
customer_reviews.author: HMan714

customer_reviews.title: Thank you.
customer_reviews.text: My Order came right away, accurately, and were very friendly to order through. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Mark M

customer_reviews.title: I’m very happy with it
customer_reviews.text: I received this product exactly as advertised. I’m very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Lloyd Bachiu

customer_reviews.title: Great.
customer_reviews.text: These came packaged very nicely and the quality of the product is great.
customer_reviews.author: Melyssa Wilkinson

customer_reviews.title: Convenient
customer_reviews.text: Threw one of these in the kitchen, bar, and shed. Convenient, works well. Like the size.
customer_reviews.author: John Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these bottle openers for my daughter and one of her friends who work at a local beer and wine bar on weekends. The openers they were using did not have a covered hand grip. Both girls say they love these new openers. I will say, they are heavy and seem very well made. Unless they are lost or "walk away" I have a feeling these things will last forever!! They are well worth their price. Very pleased with this purchase and seller.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne, Fl.

customer_reviews.title: Holy crap, they're huge!
customer_reviews.text: I agree with everyone else that these work great, are high quality stainless steel and love the rubber grip but seriously... wtf is up with their size? They look like they're made for a giant! Regardless tho, they're very easy to use and i do recommend them but im knocking off 1 star.
customer_reviews.author: Whitney

customer_reviews.title: Very nice and heavy duty!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these openers for Christmas stocking gifts. When they arrived I received only 2 and although there were supposed to be 3. I think one may have somehow slipped out of the box during shipping. The 2 bottle openers I did receive I am very pleased with and are a must have for every kitchen. I gave this product a 4 only because of the missing bottle opener, but it is definitely a 5 star product.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Chaffins

customer_reviews.title: Awesome pro bottle opener!
customer_reviews.text: These Axim USA bottle openers are like professional bartenders and servers use. They are outstanding. Ruggedly made, durable, these bad boys will keep the party going in style. Plus, they are a great value. Try these out, you won't be sorry!
customer_reviews.author: David Perry

customer_reviews.title: Light but not cheap metal. Good buy.
customer_reviews.text: I have a normal size hand. Stand about 5’9”. This fits well in my hand. Is very sturdy. Looks like it will last a long time. Feels heavy but not so heavy that it’s cumbersome. Easy to use. Gets my sparkling water and beer caps off the first time every time.
customer_reviews.author: Gilbert Baca

customer_reviews.title: Light  Strong Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: light but strong. Easy to find in cluttered drawer and ergonomically friendly to seniors and disabled. Very easy to get the job done of taking off caps from bottles
customer_reviews.author: Ralph H Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Great bottle openers
customer_reviews.text: Great bottle openers! I bought a 3 pack so I could have one in the kitchen, one on the patio and one to keep with my camping gear. The bottle openers are very well made, sturdy and easy to hold. It was easy to lift the cap off of my bottle with just one try - not having to work around the cap multiple times like my old bottle opener. I'm happy with these and would recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: carodoo

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a couple bottle openers that were classic, durable, and felt good in my hand. These hit the mark and are exactly what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Vic

customer_reviews.title: Great openers at a great price!
customer_reviews.text: Just what we needed! We have a mobile bar business, so we need a lot of these. They work perfectly, have a nice grip and are very affordable. Everything we could ask for!
customer_reviews.author: Dave Slagle

customer_reviews.title: The best bottle opener around !
customer_reviews.text: These bottle openers have to be the fastest, easiest way to open glass beverage bottles. The handles don’t bend when they are used a lot and they are very easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: OrbGems

customer_reviews.title: Bottle openers sturdy and easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: The bottle opener came quickly and we'll packaged. Heavy weight and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Marcia

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product!
customer_reviews.text: This purchase was made for our office and what I love is they are a slightly larger size that DOESN'T fit in your pocket and walk away. They are working perfectly for the office. Now I'll order a 3-pack for home use!
customer_reviews.author: RoseW

customer_reviews.title: Axim USA Premium Cold One Bartender Bottle Openers
customer_reviews.text: I was always looking for a bottle opener so this package of three will be convenient for me. Thanks for the prompt service I received.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Bynum

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Our family bartender approved this message! Easy to use and store in back pocket and it is sturdy. You can tell by the weight of it too. She works at a fast-paced bar and it’s super convenient. Love that it comes in a 3-pack too.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Alkire

customer_reviews.title: Solid bottle openers.
customer_reviews.text: Stop buying crappy bottle openers. Get something like this. In fact, just get this. Good price, you get 3, nothing to worry about.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: What you see is what you get.
customer_reviews.text: Solid build quality; simple and effective. Fairly large. The upside is they are not easy to lose.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Weight, User Friendly
customer_reviews.text: Solid, good-looking, easy-use beverage opener. Apologies for earlier “false alarm” - as one “3 set” arrived with a single opener - but 2 MIA openers had somehow slipped under a box flap, hidden from view. No complaint! Good quality!
customer_reviews.author: Beverly Hubble Tauke

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: I love the 3 pack to place them in different locations in my home. They are very sturdy. I highly recommend these bottle openers.
customer_reviews.author: Stacia

customer_reviews.title: Bartender approved
customer_reviews.text: I used these when I bartended and they are light, easy to carry, and bartender approved. I have one chained to the cooler for bbqs or boating. Very durable.
customer_reviews.author: dancejunkie7

customer_reviews.title: Does their job
customer_reviews.text: I mean hey, they’re solid openers and you get 3 in an order. No brainer
customer_reviews.author: J.H.

customer_reviews.title: Great Bottle Openers
customer_reviews.text: These are very nice bottle openers! Fits well in my hand and is easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Dianne B

customer_reviews.title: Great Bottle Opener
customer_reviews.text: These bottle openers work exactly as they are meant to. I'm happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: TheTurtle

customer_reviews.title: My second opener order
customer_reviews.text: We liked it so much the first time that we order more. It has a nice weight and grasp. Does the job and it's easy to store. We are putting them in all our pantries.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa E Skubel

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Heavy, good grip, easy to use,lays flat in drawer Tried it on different bottle tops all easy to open
customer_reviews.author: lar

customer_reviews.title: Bullet Proof Bottle Openers
customer_reviews.text: These bottle openers are great and seem bullet proof so far.
customer_reviews.author: Tippy Canoe

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect. I bought magnets to attach to the back so they can go on the fridge.
customer_reviews.author: SUAShawn
